TextLibrary.Text: Lord Bane caught us in Gornak's Gap and sent a storm to stop us. We had to turn back. Is there another way into Bane's lands?
Lord Bane caught us in Gornak's Gap and sent a storm to stop us. We had to turn back. Is there another way into Bane's lands?
Lord Bane caught us in Gornak's Gap and sent a storm to stop us. We had to turn back. Is there another way into Bane's lands?
Lord Bane caught us in Gornak's Gap and sent a storm to stop us. We had to turn back. Is there another way into Bane's lands?
No. Not from the Realms of War. You must travel through Hyaan, down to the coast and then up into the High Elven lands.
No. Not from the Realms of War. You must travel through Hyaan, down to the coast and then up into the High Elven lands.
No. Not from the Realms of War. You must travel through Hyaan, down to the coast and then up into the High Elven lands.
No. Not from the Realms of War. You must travel through Hyaan, down to the coast and then up into the High Elven lands.
At least, now that the pass is blocked, Lord Bane can't trouble your people anymore.
At least, now that the pass is blocked, Lord Bane can't trouble your people anymore.
At least, now that the pass is blocked, Lord Bane can't trouble your people anymore.
At least, now that the pass is blocked, Lord Bane can't trouble your people anymore.
Yes - that is good. And he will no longer be able to bring slaves and metal this way. Let us hope that the High Elves still hold the other two passes into his lands...
